title: Halsey (singer)
summary: Ashley Nicolette Frangipane (/ˌfrændʒɪˈpɑːni/;[1] born September 29, 1994), known professionally as Halsey[2] (IPA: /ˈhɔːlzi/, /ˈhɑːlzi/), is an American singer and songwriter. Gaining attention from self-released music on social media platforms, she[lower-alpha 1] was signed by Astralwerks in 2014 and released her debut EP, Room 93, later that year.
